question: What is Unilife Sparkford House?
answer: Sparkford House is a purpose built student accommodation in Winchester. Located opposite the University of Winchester on Sparkford Road, Sparkford House is just a 10-second walk from the [University of Winchester](https://www.winchester.ac.uk/). Students studying at [The Winchester School of Art](https://www.southampton.ac.uk/about/faculties-schools-departments/winchester-school-of-art) can enjoy a 15 minute walk through the city. We have 90 studios in the building which allows us to offer a more personalised service to our students. We also have some fantastic communal spaces. Our Unilife team is dedicated to creating a lively community and goes above and beyond to ensure you have everything you need to succeed.

question: What types of student accommodation does Unilife Sparkford House offer?
answer: Unilife Sparkford House offers a range of self-contained studio apartments, including Classic, Premium, Premium Plus, Luxury, Luxury Plus, VIP, and VIP Plus studios, each catering to different requirements and preferences.

question: Is Unilife Sparkford House suitable for both undergraduate and postgraduate students?
answer: Yes, Sparkford House is suitable for both undergraduate and postgraduate students. Any full time student can stay at Riverside House.

question: How many rooms are available in Sparkford House?
answer: Sparkford House has a total of 90 studios in total, offering a personalised living experience.

question: How many floors are there in Sparkford ?
answer: Sparkford House has 4 floors.

question: How can I make an inquiry about availability at Sparkford House?
answer: You can contact the Sparkford House team via phone at +44 7802322917 email at yourspace@unilife.co.uk or send us a WhatsApp to start chatting.

question: How do I apply for accommodation at Sparkford House?
answer: You can book your accommodation directly through the Unilife website or by contacting the Unilife team via email or phone for assistance with the process.

question: How can I cancel or modify my booking at Sparkford House?
answer: If your preferred studio type is sold out on the website, please contact the sales team who will confirm the procedure to go onto the waiting list.

question: Is there a waiting list for available rooms at Sparkford House?
answer: If your preferred studio type is sold out on the website, please contact the sales team who will confirm the procedure to go onto the waiting list.

question: How far in advance should I book my room at Sparkford House?
answer: It is recommended to book as early as possible, especially during peak periods, to secure your preferred room type and location.

question: Can I stay during the summer months, or is it only available during term time?
answer: Yes, Riverside House is open all year round and the Unilife team will be here to support you throughout your stay!

question: Does Sparkford House accept international students?
answer: Yes, Sparkford House is open to international students and provides a supportive environment tailored to their needs.

question: How do I confirm my booking after applying for a room at Sparkford House?
answer: Confirming your booking at Sparkford House is simple! After submitting your application, all you need to do is sign your contract and pay the deposit. Once that’s done, the property manager will review your tenancy and co-sign the agreement, finalising everything. You’ll then receive an email notification with your official assured shorthold tenancy agreement attached.

question: Is there a minimum lease term for rooms at Sparkford House?
answer: Yes, there is a minimum lease term, typically aligning with the academic year, but you should confirm this at the time of booking.

question: What is the check-in and check-out procedure?
answer: Check-in is simple. One of the Unilife team will get in touch to arrange your arrival time and date to ensure one of the Unilife team is available to welcome you into the property. Checking out will follow the same procedure one of the Unilife Team will contact you to arrange your departure.

question: Can I rebook the same studio for the following year?
answer: Yes, absolutely! As a current resident, you’ll have priority booking for your room, ensuring you get first choice. Plus, we offer you the best available rate, making it even easier to secure your favourite studio for the following year.

question: Does Sparkford House provide a gym?
answer: Yes, Sparkford House features a state-of-the-art, 24/7 on-site gym, so you can work out whenever it suits you. Equipped with a range of cardiovascular machines and resistance weights, it’s the perfect place to stay fit and unwind after a busy day of studying or socialising.

Plus, we offer a fantastic selection of resistance machines and free weights.

question: Can I access the gym at any time of the day or night?

question: What are the maintenance procedures at Sparkford House?

answer: The Reception is staffed by a City Manager and House Supervisor who are available daily to assist residents Monday to Friday. There is a 24 hour Unilife number if you need assistance out of hours.

question: What types of social events are hosted at Sparkford House?

question: Are there any regular fitness classes or activities offered?

question: Does Sparkford House have any special events or celebrations throughout the year?

question: Is there a place where I can meet with friends or study together?

question: What is included in the Grab & Go breakfast?
answer: The Grab and Go breakfast is available from 08:00, Monday to Friday. We provide fresh pastries and sweet treats Monday to Thursday and fresh fruit and yoghurts on a Friday.

question: How often are events held at Sparkford House?

question: Are there social spaces where I can relax and watch TV?

question: What is included in the studio apartment at Sparkford House?
answer: Each studio apartment at Unilife Sparkford House is fully furnished and includes a small double or double bed (depending on the studio type), a comfortable study desk with chest of drawers, a large fitted wardrobe, a private kitchenette, an ensuite bathroom, a smart TV with a TV licence, superfast 1,000 Mbps Wi-Fi, and all utility bills are covered.

question: How are the rooms furnished at Sparkford House?
answer: You will enjoy a cosy small double bed, a study desk with a comfortable office chair for focused work, and plenty of shelving space to organise your belongings. A large, fitted wardrobe offers ample storage, while the fully equipped kitchenette allows you to prepare meals at your convenience. The ensuite bathroom adds an extra level of privacy and comfort, making your room the ideal space to relax, study, and enjoy your time at university!

question: Are there TVs in every studio at Sparkford House?
answer: Yes, each studio includes a 28” TV for entertainment.

question: Are the studios quiet and conducive for studying?

question: Are the rooms suitable for couples or shared living?
answer: Yes, absolutely! We offer purpose-built studios for dual occupancy, perfect for friends or couples who want to share their living space. Choose from our Luxury, Luxury Plus, and VIP options, all designed with comfort in mind. What's even better? We offer free dual occupancy – there’s no additional charge for sharing these studios! Each studio comes with a spacious double bed, two large wardrobes, and two study desks, ensuring plenty of room and comfort for both of you.

question: Is there a kitchenette in each room at Sparkford House?
answer: Yes, every studio at Riverside House comes with its own private kitchenette, fully equipped with everything you need to cook and enjoy meals in the comfort of your room. You’ll find essential appliances including a hob with extractor fan, microwave, oven, fridge-freezer, and plenty of storage cabinets.

question: What does a Classic Studio include?
answer: The Classic Studio at Sparkford House offers everything you need for a comfortable and convenient student living experience. It features a cozy small double bed, a study desk with a chair to create the perfect study space, and a smart TV with a TV licence for relaxation and entertainment. You’ll also enjoy a private ensuite bathroom for added privacy and convenience, as well as a fully equipped kitchenette with essential appliances, making it easy to cook and enjoy meals whenever you like.

question: How is the layout of a Classic Studio?
answer: The spacious layout is designed for single occupancy, with designated areas for sleeping, studying, and cooking.

answer: The interior is the same. The difference is that the Premium Studios offer better views due to their location on the 1st floor, compared to the ground floor studios.

answer: The Premium Studios offer better views due to their location on the 1st floor, compared to the ground floor studios.

answer: Premium Plus Studios are located on floors 2nd, 3rd and 4th compared to floor one of the Premium. Not only do they provide better views, they are quieter as they are further away from the communal areas.

question: What makes a Luxury Studio different from a Classic or Premium Studio?
answer: The main difference is that our classic and premium studios are single occupancy rooms and our Luxury studios are dual occupancy. The Luxury studios is much larger than the other studio types and it offers more space and amenities to enjoy.

question: Can a Luxury Studio accommodate two students?
answer: Yes, the Luxury studio is an excellent choice for students looking to share accommodation! Designed with dual occupancy in mind, it’s perfect for couples or friends who want to enjoy the comforts of luxury living together. You can choose between two single beds or one large double bed, tailored to your preference. The studio also comes with two spacious study desks and two large wardrobes, ensuring plenty of space and convenience for both residents. It’s the ideal living space for sharing without compromising on comfort or style.

question: Does a Luxury Studio come with two study desks?
answer: Yes, Luxury Studios include two study desks to accommodate dual occupancy.

question: What additional features are offered in a Luxury Studio that are not in other studio types?
answer: Luxury Studios feature more space than the single occupancy studios. It also includes two study desks, two wardrobes, more storage and amenities for two people to enjoy.

question: How are Luxury Plus Studios different from standard Luxury Studios?
answer: The Luxury Plus Studios are located on floors 2nd, 3rd and 4th compared to the ground and 1st floor of the Luxury studios. Not only do they provide better views, they are quieter as they are further away from the communal areas.

question: Are Luxury Plus Studios designed for dual occupancy?
